website_summaries.verdict: Durable and portable air sofa made with convenience and comfort in mind.
pros: Air sofa is lightweight, cheap, and comes in a variety of colors
Features ergonomic design, and includes pockets and cupholders for convenience, and stakes for secure placement
cons: Just over six feet long when inflated
May only stay inflated a couple hours at a time

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun product! At first, there are some awkward to set up, but after a few times of attempts I got the hang of it- actually quite simple. I really enjoy lounging in hammocks. Although the process is a bit different, It is super comfortable.The pockets and drink strap are well placed and quite handy. After a series of rigorous uses, it still hold its air perfect. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff He

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up and Fun
customer_reviews.text: This was actually pretty easy to inflate. It may look at first like there isn't enough air in it but once you roll the end a little you see there is plenty. This also comes with a steak for windy days. Each side has a pocket to put your things in. This is very comfortable and a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Ford

customer_reviews.title: Mind blowing!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed on the material. It was easy to set up and I’m 5’2. I was able to use it with someone else on it as well. It never untied itself. Such a useful product especially when you spend a lot of your time outdoors. Very convenient to take with you as well. I honestly have no complaints about this product. That’s the picture I took when I was using it with my partner, it was memorable.
customer_reviews.author: Val D.

customer_reviews.title: Best gift I have ever given!!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a huge hit with my daughter this Christmas. We opened it up and inflated it right away. She has already used it camping and uses it in her apartment as an everyday reading lounge!!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Dalby

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING! I ordered it for a outdoor music festival and it was the best choice ever. The material is durable and you can adjust how big you want it (lengthwise) by the amount of air you put in. I’m a lot shorter than my husband and found I was more comfortable with it being a little smaller. The only downside is you look completely ridiculous when filling it but it was totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer True

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This was a super easy to use very comfortable chair. Took it to the beach and it was nice to have a place to sit not in the sand and watch the sunset. Very portable. Thinking of getting one for all our kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to bring to the beach and it was perfect. It was easy to fill with air (definitely need 2 people) and when it's packed in the bag it takes up very little space and is lightweight. I suppose you could probably use this in your office too if you feel like taking a nap.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time. They don't work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I wanted so badly to like this! Multiple people from our group tried to get this to inflate and no one could. We tried the wind... Nothing worked. Eventually we gave up and decided to return it. Maybe a fan would've worked, but I wanted this for outdoor activities and camping. It was totally defective. Did not work for any of us as advertised. One guy even saw us struggling and while walking by said "those things totally suck, they're a huge rip off, don't waste your time". Unfortunately he was totally right.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh09

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for your life.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to our teenager for her birthday because she plays beach volleyball. The sand can get hot and she wanted something to sit on while reffing or taking a break. When she opened it, she squealed because she was so excited to have her own. My husband took her outside to inflate it and it was easier than we thought. It was a little breezy outside and my husband just ran with it and it filled up with air. This lounger can hold up to 400 pounds, so 3 teens can fit on it comfortably. The material is thick, durable and light to carry. Comes with a storage bag, patch kit, and instructions.
customer_reviews.author: JetNoise

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and easy to travel with
customer_reviews.text: We love this inflatable lounger. It's easy to set-up and the entire family fights over who gets to lay in it. I especially like the customer service. I had a question and they responded right away and were super helpful. Even better, if you leave a facebook comment, they'll send you another lounger or anything you want from their store (see booklet when your lounger arrives for info). I opted for a single, camping air mattress. They sent it two-day shipping. I just used it for two nights on a canoeing hike-in trip and I didn't have a single ache the next morning, blows up in a minute. First time in years no aches after sleeping in a tent.
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!! Better than others on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped for an inflatable lounger in several places before deciding on this one. I am so glad that I did. I saw where other customers had problems with other brands being hard to inflate BUT NOT THIS ONE!! It inflated easily on the first try, and the breeze was light. When I was finished it was easy to deflate and roll up to stow in the supplied bag. This one holds a lot of weight, so two or more people can sit on it without a problem. I am so happy with my air lounger, that I plan to buy another one!!
customer_reviews.author: Calista

customer_reviews.title: Great for music festivals or when you want to lay low
customer_reviews.text: My first experience with this type of seatingwas at a music festival (Hinterland in Iowa). A friend had one of these loungers while I had the hard ground, and whenever he got up I would slide into his lounger. It made the music festival so much better to lounge comfortably while not impeding anyone’s view. So I purchased 2 (right from my phone while lounging) so at this year’s festival I would be comfortable. I doubt there will be a festival this year due to the current situation, but I’ll have my yard to lounge in. I can’t speak of durability yet since I’ve used it a handful of times, but it has worked so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jumper

customer_reviews.title: Great new family activity
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a purple lounger for my 22yr old special needs granddaughter. Never realized it would be such a wonderful new relaxing item. Having cerebral palsy, she is confined most of the day to her wheelchair. Now she can stretch out, move freely and hang out in the yard with no restrictions. I just purchased a second lounger (acqua) for others in the family to enjoy along side her or even be together sitting sideways. I highly recommend one for all folks and especially those limited to being held in seat belts, straps, and chairs -- this is new found freedom. Also, so easy to take along to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: neecie

customer_reviews.title: Like a cloud
customer_reviews.text: I have been loving this lounger so much I even use it inside. I weigh over 300 lbs and it doesn't mind at all. The shape for the headrest is very comfortable too. I've been telling my camping friends and we are gonna have a bunch of these soon.
customer_reviews.author: s. elling

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, and even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I received one of these as a gift and absolutely loved it. I decided to buy a second one, and it was delivered having a small pinhole leak. I contacted customer service, and they responded quickly and replaced it in a flash. I absolutely recommend this product and company. I love the portability and ease of use(watch videos on YouTube, and practice). We use ours primarily for going to the beach. We love it! Mostly because it keeps most of the sand where it belongs..., on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Happy Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: This was single handedly THE most comfortable lounger ever. Seriously. I'm a person that prefers to lounge than sit so camping chairs have always been somewhat uncomfortable for me. I am sooo happy with this! My family had an inappropriate name for this the entire weekend but their tune changed as soon as they gave it a try. They all want one now. I cheated and used an electric pump to blow it up instead of trying to run around. It worked just fine that way. I am a bigger woman and have 0 complaints about its durability or support. In fact I'm laying in it in my living room writing this review. I highly recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: bgonyaw

customer_reviews.title: Better than expectation
customer_reviews.text: Beyond happy with this! Took a little skill to fill with air but a trick is to use a floor fan!!!! Fills it up in 2 seconds. This was originally purchased for my kids but I have already found it to be a comfy spot, especially with a bad back.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: I definitely will buy more.
customer_reviews.text: I got this air lounger last night so I tested it right away. Everyone in my family loves it. It is so easy to blow up. As long as you have enough room to walk/run in a straight line to catch the air. I like how lightweight and compact it is compared to folding chairs. It's actually very comfortable to lay down or sit on. I definitely will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Linh R

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: The material is very easily punctured. There are no sharp edges in my room and yet there are two mini scratches that are leaking air. Can’t even see a hole. Covered it up with so much duct tape and the air is still leaking out somehow. This happened during its second use so I’m pretty frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Haewon Park

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and convenient inflatable air lounge
customer_reviews.text: What a convenient and great product. I bought this planning to use at the beach but I hasn't had a chance yet since it's been so cold. However with the holidays season, I have been able to use it for my guesses come and stay overnight at my house. I used it as an extra "bed" in my living room. It's comfortable to lay down and easy to inflate. Then I can put it away easily and saving lots of spaces. My husband approved ;)
customer_reviews.author: Uyen Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Your own personal cloud
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflate, easy to deflate, and as comfortable as a cloud! Stores in its own bag and weighs so little, you can carry it anywhere. In 10 seconds....voila! you have a cloud. Thanks Alphabeing
customer_reviews.author: Fishn777

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Cant wait to take it to Mexico
customer_reviews.text: This product is EXACTLY as advertised. It met all of my expectations. It is extremely durable and will be perfect for our beach vacation both in the water and lying on the beach. Now i dont have to get up at 5am to get a lounge chair. Thank you Alphabeing! With your prices and great product i will be buying more for friends and family
customer_reviews.author: shannon griggs

customer_reviews.title: Total steal! This is such a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with the purchase. The air soda is so comfortable, and much higher quality than I expected for the price. The process to inflate is super simple to get the hang of, and actually pretty fun. My daughter giggled a bunch watching me figure it out. This is a great option for a family camping trip, my daughter and I can lounge together and it’s big enough for my husband to be comfy on to. A really great product all in all.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but doesn't stay inflated for long
customer_reviews.text: I have a love hate relationship with this product. Great at the campsite to inflate and take a quick snooze. Especially if you can't hook up the hammock. The only problem is it has to be a power nap as it only keeps enough inflation for about 30 to 45 minutes before you need to reinflate....or just deal with having your arse on the ground. Takes a lot to get it fully inflated, but not a deal breaker if you can't since you can roll it until it firms up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros, HANDS ON, this is the BEST of this product! I bought a few of them in the past, none of them is durable and solid like this one! Cons, like all other inflatable lounge, wind is your best friend, otherwise, you have to run a few times and play with it to make it work. It is not easy. But once it’s inflated, it’s like you lying on cloud 9! Will buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Nice air lounger from a great company
customer_reviews.text: I used the air lounger while camping in the mountains. the provided anchor held it in place well and the carrabiener made moving/refilling easy. the chair held air for most of the day and was a hit with all that sat in it. The seller contacted me to make sure I was having a good experience and even offered a free air lounger just as a thank you. The free gift is indeed nice, but has not influenced my review. The bed performed as expected and i had an overall good experience. I will add make sure you have on your belt before running with the air lounger and roll it tight to get it back in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary A.

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat difficult to inflate at first, but comfy once inflated.
customer_reviews.text: Tough to inflate the first time, but I learned that I needed to run a bit farther and be willing to roll it up and push air down into it before running around to fill it again. Very comfy once inflated. I have it 3 out of 5 stars for durability, because my dog jumped onto me while I was laying on it one time and since then, it slowly deflates over time from an unknown leakage point.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great low-cost option, self deflates after a few days.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great option if you've never tried a blow up chair and you aren't sure if you want to commit. Mine has been used gently, and I'm uncertain if it has a slow leak or the air escapes when there's no weight holding the closure tight. I made sure to roll the end-closure neatly and multiple times but the chair still deflates by about 35% after a few days of intermittent use.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great for reading and lounging
customer_reviews.text: I got the AlphaBeing to use as a reading lounge seat in my office. I needed something that wouldn’t take up too much space and that I could store easily while not using. It’s super easy to inflate, just run around outside a few minutes and capture air. Nice and comfortable and works great for what I wanted. Also look forward to taking it with me on camping trips!
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: A magic air couch
customer_reviews.text: While I wouldn't recommend it for laying in for hours upon hours, it has always been a dream to inflate, and only feel silly for about 30 seconds--the time it takes for me to inflate. It's done great outside, up against sand and metal, and obviously as extra indoor seating. Its comfortable as a chair for two grown adults, or to lay in for one. It fits four kids, and is generally convenient for all occasions from the beach, to a picnic, to the living room!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up and store!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived just in time for a picnic . It took us a minute to figure it out but it's actually very easy to inflate, once you follow the directions. Came with a matching carrying case, a stake to anchor it to the ground, and repair patches.
customer_reviews.author: johna nwamanna

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved it. Can use as a couch for multiple seating or as a lounge chair for one!! My grandkids liked to throw themselves on it and bounced off. It became a game. Sure it didn’t always work out for them but they had more fun than not, with it. We looked a little silly getting the hang of filling it with air, but we had a few laughs and figured it out and it was easy to fill.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Casey

customer_reviews.title: Essential chronic fatigue travel companion
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these because I have pretty bad fatigue and I need to lie down regularly. Having this thing on hand has been a lifesaver. The little headrest feature is really a bonus. I bought one of these in August and traveled with it, using it pretty regularly outdoors in gravel and on sand and grass. It took six months to get a hole in it. I’m pretty satisfied with that durability. There doesn’t really seem to be a way to patch it because the inner lining is just a plastic bag. I ordered a second one. I will probably salvage the ripstop nylon from the first one and use it for something else.
customer_reviews.author: M Sum

customer_reviews.title: Good product, need wind to inflate.
customer_reviews.text: I've looked into buying one of these for a while and I'm glad I picked this one. These types of loungers are super portable, light weight, and comfortable. The only problem is they can be hard to inflate and must have a good wind to inflate. If you bring it to the beach you won't have a problem, but in the park on a breeze less day, you'll be running around quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing warranty great product!
customer_reviews.text: Within minutes of trying it out my wife had to order one for herself. These are extremely comfortable easy to fill up and pack up really small. We actually popped one but it was our fault. An ember from the campfire touched it and it burned a big hole. The company is one of the best I have ever delt with. They sent me a new one with no questions asked. Several of our freinds have ordered the same ones after camping with us. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Not a paid review; genuinely a happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: So, I purchased another brand lounger before buying this one. The material was thin and not durable. I bought this one and it was NIGHT and DAY different. The ripstop material AlphaBeing uses is far superior than the flimsy fabric I had prior. This lounger has pockets also! The seals are much better than the cheaper knockoff. If you want an air lounger done right - buy this one. I’m glad I bought this. These will be great for the forth of July! Thank you for making a quality product. Side note: you should offer a hot pink
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome lounge!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly wasn't expecting much but this thing was really awesome to sit / last on during a multi day backpacking trip! Almost everybody took a turn napping in it. Surprisingly durable (even after some embers from a camp fire burned a hole in it managed to patch it up and keep using it). Would definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: super fun
customer_reviews.text: Ok- you're going to look like an idiot running back and forth filling this thing with air. But then you'll get to relax in it, and it will be worth it! I really enjoyed this lounger. Great for camping, or bringing to an airbnb, but also great to keep in the backyard. We had it set up for 4 days, it looked like it deflated a little after a day, but felt exactly the same when i sat in it, so i might be wrong. for $40 I would say very worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go to the beach without these
customer_reviews.text: Okay so these are a bit tricky to inflate had to waste YouTube to figure it out. My son ended up doing it for us. They were a hit everyone wanted to lay on them. Also they do support the plush sized person. I was really surprised. I recommend anyone with kid to buy these. We love them. Just know they take some practice to get the air in also you need enough room to move around.
customer_reviews.author: BreAnn

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks our socks!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this for our office, and we are the HEROES of our co-working space. Not only did we endlessly entertain everyone on our floor by running through the halls trying to inflate the dang thing (it is definitely a skill that must be mastered), but everyone keeps coming into our office to hang out! Honestly, we're having trouble getting work done because of this thing... haha! Jokes aside, we're really digging this. It's super comfortable to sit or lay on, and we will definitely be getting a second one. Move over standing-desks—air-lounger desks are the newest workplace accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Snax Foods

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I would have gave 5 stars but my Wekapo version of this is a lot easier to inflate and use. I don’t know why because they have the same material and structure.
customer_reviews.author: Stephani

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have for camping
customer_reviews.text: Once its filled it's great. Holds in the air for the day. I did find it difficult to inflate with out the use of my shop vac or my battery powered fan. Maybe if there were stronger winds it would of been easier to fill by running. Their instructions. However I didnt have much luck filling it following their instructions
customer_reviews.author: Robert Southrey

customer_reviews.title: Tough stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is one tough lounge chair. Ours has been jumped on by the littlest children, piled on by the heavyweight teenagers and adults just needing a place to rest. The only reason I gave 4 star for inflation is because the smaller lids had a difficult time filling. Older kids and adults however no problem. Yes, I do recommend to anyone wanting an extra seat. Home, camping events etc folds up easy, very packable.
customer_reviews.author: Deed

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: Inflated the couch as soon as it came in the mail to try it out, super easy to inflate and close. It was extremely comfortable! My husband fell alseep on it in minutes outside. My dog was over excited and jumped on it while I was laying on it and it didnt pop! Great product for a great price, the color is exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Val C.

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed. What a great value!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great for its simple design, portability, and ease of use. It takes a little practice to fill it but it’s a lot easier and more practical than having to pump it up. Once you’re in it, it’s quite comfortable. I’m impressed. Also, the manufacturer seems committed to insuring a good experience and providing support in the event of any problems or defects.
customer_reviews.author: P. R. S.

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, easy enough to inflate
customer_reviews.text: It takes a descent amount of room to inflate. The built in pillow is too high. The more air that's in it the more taught the material becomes. I lay on it backwards, seems to be fine. It's very noisy, very crinkly when moving around on it. I'm not sure if other brands are made the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Deenard

customer_reviews.title: Great lounger
customer_reviews.text: Read the instructions when trying to inflate. It's very important to run in a straight line while trying to inflate. was able to easily inflate in my back yard without much room. Pockets are nice but ground stake could be a little longer for the beach. Material seems strong. Would def buy again
customer_reviews.author: lloyd

customer_reviews.title: So practical, easy to use and better than a bean bag!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for a long trip. Daughter had to have it blown up in the van. She loved how it felt, like getting a big hug. We checked on her an hour later and she had fallen asleep. She sleep for 4 hours, the inflatable never lost air. We are huge fans of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased, holds air, easy to fill
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 4 day music festival thinking we may get a day of use out of it. I was wrong! It was great! It was pretty easy to fill, it held air great, it is so comfortable and the heavy duty clasp held perfectly. We will use this again and again. It fits perfectly inside the carrying bag. Just follow the instructions when putting it up. I'm super pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Dees

customer_reviews.title: Neat invention
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my sister whose scoliosis impedes her enjoyment of music festivals. It’s pretty darn cool. And comfy. And portable. I may get one, myself, honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Nephila

customer_reviews.title: I returned it.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item. Not happy with this. it's too hard to inflate. I have used other ones similar and they are much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use at the riverfront, beach, etc. I was so surprised at how easy it is to inflate and how comfortable it is. Super easy to pack up and carry with you. I can’t wait to use it at the beach. I’ve caught myself laying in it reading for a few hours at a time! You may have to readjust or stand up every once in awhile so your back doesn’t start to hurt but the product itself is very comfortable and easy to use. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Eric Irkliewskij

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my college boys, and they love them. Their friends have already grown attached and decided to buy some of their own. They are a good quality, lovely dark blue color, and quite comfortable and convenient for toting along with you. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get much better than this!
customer_reviews.text: We are very active outdoorsy people and buy a lot of gear on Amazon. The purchase of the inflatable lounger has been one of my favorite purchases. The product has performed perfectly thus far and the company has been one of the best at customer service. I plan to buy another one for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Abercrombie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I've used this air lounger several times on camp weekends now and it's held up great and is very comfortable. Material seems to be quality and durable for most uses and the ground peg, carabiner and patch kit is a nice inclusion. One thing to consider is when it is very hot out the material get's a bit uncomfortable sweating against it in comparison to a hammock but is otherwise very comfortable. Overall, would recommened.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Zingsheim

customer_reviews.title: This was a great birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lounger, what's even better is my kids love to air it up for me they are 12 and 7, and easily air it up together. I have only used it around the campsite. But when we were at the beach I saw someone else with one in the water. I will be trying that too!
customer_reviews.author: Cook2018

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this lounger because it was hard to tell the quality from the product page and it was a good value. The lounger is durable and I think it will last a lot longer than I expected. There is a small elastic loop that the tie down stake attaches too and it ripped. It might be a design flaw but it was probably more the abuse it got from my children while camping. Their customer service reached out to me after my purchase and they are top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Papatyre

customer_reviews.title: Skip it
customer_reviews.text: So if you want one that you can inflate with running . This is it. If you can't run, like me, get a different one. There is no specific place to blow it up.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, I’ve bought a total of 5 now
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought five of these now—I got one for myself, LOVED it, and then got them for friends as presents and they all seem to love theirs too. My only complaint is that they do start to run low on air after about five hours so using them instead of a bed is a little challenging but they can’t be beat to take to the beach or lay out in the yard for a nap. The sand barely sticks to them too!
customer_reviews.author: GoldenNebraskaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Works great for festivals.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my sister because she goes to festivals all the time. She said it’s really easy to inflate and they use it a ton. The only thing to remember with it she said is you have to tie it down if you are getting up because it blows away easily.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Trottier

customer_reviews.title: Great product! AMAZING customer service!
customer_reviews.text: First of all the product is of quality and very durable. But what blew me away is how AWESOME the customer service is! Not only did they respond almost immediately, but rather than exchange my item for a different color (my fault) they sent me the one I wanted ABSOLUTELY FREE! I'm beyond satisfied and would recommend this product and Company to friends and family! Amazing experience!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing backyard accessory
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, I love this air lounger, even though it’s kind of a pain to inflate. After watching severe YouTube video, I think I have it down reasonably well! It’s quite relaxing to lie down and chill out in my backyard. My small dogs love it as well, and always hop up to join me. Their claws haven’t punctured it, so it seems pretty durable thus far. I thought it would be gimmicky, but I was pleasantly surprised, and I’m getting a lot of use out of it!
customer_reviews.author: greykat

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely thrilled with the color. Had tried an air lounger on a kayak trip and knew I had to have one. Read a lot of reviews and selected the AlphaBeing brand. It arrived very quickly with not having prime. Once I got the air chambers opened, it wasn't hard to inflate with a light wind. Got the opening closed and it held air for 28 hrs with me laying on it and getting off and on several times. Deflating is easy and rolled it up and it went back into the carry bag. Very happy with this purchase. Look forward to taking it on kayak trips and camping.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Riding a canoe......
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, because a friend liked his, I got it for a camping trip, from the moment I laid down in it, I didnt like it. It was to hard, to soft, couldn't get comfortable, it has a built in pillow, but I thought it was way to big, and bent my neck to much. Its unstable, if you move to much one way or another, your about to tip over. It's like riding a canoe, high out of the water. I'm not saying it's not a good product, I'm just not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great quality for the price. Pretty easy to inflate even for a chunky gal like myself. I did have the bright idea to only inflate it some and use it like a chair. Epic fail. The magical crack expelled me onto the ground like a squid out of a canon. Make sure you fill it all the way or suffer the wrath of the hot dog bun.
customer_reviews.author: missmole

customer_reviews.title: The best addition to any camping trip
customer_reviews.text: I initially got this for camping, but I am already thinking of all the different ways I'll be able to use this! My friends all loved it and said they all wanted to get one before our next camping trip. It is durable and easy to clean as well as inflate. It was much easier to close than I was expecting as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah S

customer_reviews.title: What does it take to destroy one of these?
customer_reviews.text: Got a hole in the inner tube. Was able to patch it with super glue and duct tape. Now the outter casing has a broken seam and the inner tube protrudes out like a clear plastic air-mole. On the other hand I've beat the hell out of it at 5 edm music festivals in 1 year. It survived a 5-person cuddle puddle in the mud, many nights that I've passed out in it and so many memories.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seam leaks, patches don’t work.
customer_reviews.text: This product developed a seam hole underneath as all the weight is distributed on either side. I used this product 4 times before It was deemed useless. The patch that comes with it is useless as it’s the seams that come apart after minor use. Bad purchase, does not last, bad for the environment (made with plastic) please DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL LOSA

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable relaxing seating
customer_reviews.text: This was the second one that I purchased, I bought one for my self and my son loved it and I didn’t want to have to share so I bought another. These are super comfortable, light and easy to vary with you. Filing them is tricky at first but once you get the hang of it it’s fine, we had some laughs on our first few attempts. Highly recommend for outdoor or indoor lounging. Great for camping, beach days, reading a book under a tree or outdoor movie nights. This has been great for our new home instruction seating outdoors as well
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Shuback

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE our Air Hammocks!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Alphabeing air sofas. Our family owns 5 of them. My son is a track and cross country runner and loves taking them to his meets to lounge around in during their down time. Now the whole team has bought each their own. My daughter uses hers a lot at the beach or while out camping. My younger kids love setting them up for outdoor movie nights in the yard or even in the bonus room for watching family movies. I love how small and transportable they are and that you don’t need a pump or batteries to fill them with air. They are super comfortable... like laying on air.
customer_reviews.author: FATCAKE

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable. Fun for kids to have.
customer_reviews.text: With the kids meeting their friends at parks for social distant get togethers I thought it would be cool if my son had a fun way to lounge around when he can't string up his hammock. This thing is awesome. We've even floated it in a pool! I have slept in it and we've dragged all over this summer and it's held up. I would highly recommend. We call it "the bean".
customer_reviews.author: C. Knecht

customer_reviews.title: Holds the air well
customer_reviews.text: Holds air the longest of any other brand by far. Ended up ordering two so I wouldn’t have to share with the man cub. Could be a bit difficult to fill but I just put it in front of the box fan and that worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty lounge chair.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this lounge last year for our trip to Hawaii. It is small enough to pack in our luggage and really easy to carry and setup on the beach. We loved using this. This was much better than carrying and using a beach chair. This lounge is longer and heavier duty than the other lounge we have. Some of the lounges we have are much shorter when you get done wrapping them up. Great product and even better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret buying one :D
customer_reviews.text: Love my inflatable lounger! It is super comfy and really easy to air up. I bought the space grey color, which has a small purple ring to it and I love it. I actually just ordered another lounger for my husband :). Do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: awinkel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this recently for camping and it is absolutely AMAZING!!! I literally almost lived in this thing for 3 days straight. It is super comfortable and easy to inflate. I will definitely be buying some more for family gifts. Thank you for this amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.author: thomas dudney

customer_reviews.title: I had no idea what I was doing - but it was just as easy as the video
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy material, colors matched the website, easy to follow instructions. I brought it to the beach with no idea what I was doing, and figured at worst i'd watch a video on my phone. Had the seat inflated and ready to go in 5 minutes with minimal effort following the included instructions. Everyone that tried it said it felt comfortable enough, and being able to stuff it into my backpack instead of carry separately was a huge relief. Planning to buy another one in a different color for variety, since I anticipate this will get a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hou

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Used this last summer and it was great, however now it’s losing air at triple the rate as when it was new. Love the color and style, but the seams started to rip, though it doesn’t appear there is an obvious hole. I tried to repair it with duck tape to no avail. As fun as it was while it lasted, the lounger only worked for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Only complaint is how extremely difficult it is to inflate. The “running with it” method does not work. Lol we had to fill ours by using an electric air pump. Not saying it’s impossible to fill it without one, it’s just probably a very strenuous and time consuming process. Other than that, it’s a great product! It can hold a lot of weight as well so it’s perfect if you want to share it with a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fill
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize this one has 2 separate sides that need inflating. Was heavy and nearly impossible to fill one side. Couldn't get it filled properly. Seemed like nice enough material outside. Inside is a plastic bag.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and Easy to Take Places
customer_reviews.text: Took this to Puerto Rico and loved it. Easy to pack, very comfortable, easy to clean, and great for naps on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Piotr Szczepanski

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay for more than a few hours
customer_reviews.text: I decided to get this so that when I went camping or was outside hanging out I would have an additional place to sit. I really liked this product because it was really easy to inflate even whit little wind I just ran really quickly and done. The couch was able to fit and hold 3 adults but after a little, it started to get lower and after two hours you are just sitting on the ground. It is overall a perfect quick outdoor seat.
customer_reviews.author: Cayla

customer_reviews.title: Super versatile wherever you end up!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best yard/outdoor items I've bought. I really like the small form factor when it's stored vs. the size it is when inflated. My husband and I each keep one in the car for whenever we end up at anything: park, lake, cookout, whatever. It does take a little physical effort to fill, but nowhere near the headache of blowing something up with your own breath or keeping track of pumps and a variety of other equipment. We bought an additional one for my sister-in-law's high school graduation and she loved it on the beach a couple weeks later.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Cates

customer_reviews.title: Buy this right now
customer_reviews.text: This is easy as can be, more comfy than your couch and it will make you very popular at the park. Everyone stops to talk and ask about the bean! We buy these for birthday presents!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Klinke

customer_reviews.title: Beach Bed
customer_reviews.text: It's like sitting on a couch at the beach! My oldest son (12 years old), carries his "beach bed" to the ocean every weekend & takes a nap on it :) It's so easy to inflate... just catch some air... roll.... and clip. My husband and I enjoy using it too. No more achy bones from laying on the ground. Very durable; I'll be buying several more :)
customer_reviews.author: mountainflower16

customer_reviews.title: 👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: You have to run with it above your head to inflate it. Never have been able to get it inflated properly
customer_reviews.author: Dennis deNoi

customer_reviews.title: it's awesome!  can use it anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this at the beach, camping and in the yard. The stake works great with this one too and is a necessity in windy conditions. When it was used at the beach i got several comments from complete strangers wanting to know where they could buy one.
customer_reviews.author: angie skees

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, last long
customer_reviews.text: It last inflated for so long! If it deflated any, I just roll the end some more to make it firm again. I haven’t had to fill it again all week (it is being used as a temporary couch in the living room).
customer_reviews.author: Thalia Duran

customer_reviews.title: Hiking Special
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to fill the air and easy to carry. It will stay strong for atleast 2-3 hours. So far happy with product, will keep you posted with updates if i find anything wrong
customer_reviews.author: Ramvi

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had any issues with it yet. To be honest, I love this lounger. I'm fact, it's going to be my go-to gift this year. It's comfortable, compact, easy to setup. What more could you ask for? Only problem is when there's no wind....but a little jog and it's full of air.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Shum

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical but this thing is great!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to inflate and so comfortable! I didn't think it was gonna be so great but am really enjoying it - perfect for sitting out to read a book or take a nap outside. Very durable - will probably get another!
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Use a pump to inflate. Avoid the hassle
customer_reviews.text: I really have enjoyed this product on our camping trips. It’s very comfortable once it’s inflated. It’s provided a great napping spot. My only issue is it takes a lot to inflate. I’ve watched all the YouTube videos on how to inflate. We finally gave up and used a pump which works beautifully to fill quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Van Schaack

customer_reviews.title: Good for the beach and relaxing on the deck
customer_reviews.text: Brought these too the beach and really enjoyed napping in them in the sun. Decently easy to inflate aside from the laugh form onlookers as I ran up and down the beach. The stake definitely is must on a windy day. Although I think the pup enjoyed sleeping in it more than I did!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Zalan

customer_reviews.title: Great for when my back starts hurting and I'm outside.
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this lounger, I have 3 stars for the inflation because I have back and hip issues and running is not something I can do. Instead I use my ATV, the comfort is great and adjustable from firm to soft by either releasing air for softer and for firmer just simply adjust the closure. I think that these will make great stocking stuffers for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate, easy to put in the bag, light to carry
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm very happy with this purchase. Took it to the beach and it was inflated within seconds. I always thought these things were so stupid at first, but now I sort of love it. You will feel like it's not inflated, but when you roll it to cinch it shut, you'll see that it's actually fine.
customer_reviews.author: rwcmom

customer_reviews.title: Teenager loves it!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I bought it for my son for Christmas. He is in track and they spend a lot of time just sitting around waiting for their turn. He is really excited to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Bechtold

customer_reviews.title: It held a tough game
customer_reviews.text: My nephews loved it. We were even playing that game were they rest on the lounger and an adult falls into it, launching the kids a little bit into the air. Surprisingly it held well. No holes or anything. If it feels like losing a little bit of air, which is normal, just roll it a little bit more until it feels tight again. No need to open it and inflate it every time.
customer_reviews.author: Anis

customer_reviews.title: Air couch + mushrooms = 🤯
customer_reviews.text: Worked awesome for a festival, unmatched experience. Sitting solo in it feels like you’re blasting off on a rocket ship equipped with dolby atmos, also held as many people as i could fit on it without busting (4) great for a midday nap in the sun and very portable. The only complaint i have is i wish the bottom was comprised of a plastic material because the mud definitely left stains, which was unsightly. 10/10 would recommend sitting this thing in the middle of a crowd and wobbling off in a mental cosmos.
customer_reviews.author: William alan davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the alphabeing air sofa for a trip to the beach we took this winter. It worked great. The material is great for the beach because sand doesn’t stick to it and it stays cool in the sun. What I was particularly thrilled about was its sturdiness. We are a big family ranging in weights from 200 to 275 lbs and heights from 5’9” to 6’ 2” and it fit us comfortably. It packs up small and fit in our suitcase no problem. My only regret was that I didn’t order one for each of us!
customer_reviews.author: heather lanphere

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her boyfriend love this inflatable lounger. It takes a bit to get inflated, but once it's filled, it will hold the air for a week or more. It comfortably fits two teens. Planning on buying a second one for my other teen. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joelle McGill

customer_reviews.title: Loses air over time.
customer_reviews.text: We filled it up with a leafblower and it seated us both just fine, but after an hour or 2 we started hittin the ground. For what it is and what it costs, meh, it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson DeJaynes

product_meta.title: AlphaBeing Inflatable Lounger - Best Air Lounger for Travelling, Camping, Hiking - Ideal Inflatable Couch for Pool and Beach Parties - Perfect Air Chair for Picnics or Festivals
feature_bullets: EASY INFLATION DESIGN -- No pump required for AlphaBeing air lounger. Just a few scoops of air and this inflatable lounger is ready to hangout in. This is a must-have for any BBQ, Pool Party, Beach, Hike, Concert, or Camping Trip. Folding to 12"x 8"x 4"and fitting in its own carrying bag with shoulder strap, this air sofa is ready to be taken anywhere with you.

ANTI-DEFLATION TECHNOLOGY -- Love the idea of an inflatable couch but hate the idea of constantly needing to fill it up? Thanks to our anti-deflation technology, our air chair retains air twice as long as other Inflatable Loungers for an experience that is amazing! Our lounger is made with superb craftsmanship and high-quality Ripstop fabric that is lightweight, comfortable and strong enough to support 400lbs!

UNIQUE HEADREST DESIGN -- Our Unique Ergonomic Neck Pillow headrest allows you to relax with maximum comfort. Just throw it in the back of your car then blow it up at the beach, parks, camping, hiking, traveling, music festivals and any other outdoor adventures. Feeling lazy? Just chill in your backyard with our air hammock.

POCKETS, BEER OPENER & SECURE STAKES: Our inflatable couch has 2 large mesh pockets on one side to store magazines, glasses or iPad and the other side has an elastic strap for your ice cold beer; All important things are within arm’s reach. AlphaBeing Camp Chair even includes a beer opener to help you chill when you hangout with your friends and a securing stake to hold the inflatable couch firmly in place on a windy day.

100% RISK-FREE WARRANTY -- At AlphaBeing, our mission is to be Amazon's most customer-centric brand. So we stand firmly behind our product quality and service. If you are not 100% happy with the blowup couch for any reason, simply write us and we will Refund or Replace your Purchase. NO QUESTIONS ASKED.
